translation.en: [host] Yes, it is actually confirmed.
translation.zh: 是的 已经确认了

translation.en: 1.6-million-dollar prize pool!
translation.zh: 奖金池为160万美元

translation.en: I'm double-checking to make sure they haven't changed any details since last time.
translation.zh: 我还在反复确认各方面细节 确保它们没有发生任何变化

translation.en: One million in US dollars for first prize.
translation.zh: 第一名奖金真的是100万美元

translation.en: That is for the winner. One million dollars for winning Dota!
translation.zh: 这是为冠军提供的 赢得刀塔比赛的胜利 就能获得100万美元

translation.en: It's gonna be huge. Dota2.com. The tournament tab is up, too.
translation.zh: 这定会盛况空前 《刀塔》游戏官网也上线了比赛专题

translation.en: Our website will actually change for the next 24 hours as well,
translation.zh: 我们的网站 也会在未来24小时里上线更新

translation.en: so you get to read all the details…
translation.zh: 供大家阅读详情

translation.en: [hyhy] The day I transformed into an adult was the day I started playing Dota.
translation.zh: 成为职业刀塔选手就是我的成人礼

translation.en: It's times like, when you go up on the stage,
translation.zh: 有那么一些时刻 比如在你走上赛场时

translation.en: you represent your country for something.
translation.zh: 你意识到自己代表了自己的国家

translation.en: You get the prize.
translation.zh: 你获得名次时

translation.en: It's the amount of satisfaction and achievement that nothing else can give you.
translation.zh: 这种满足感和成就感是无可比拟的

translation.en: It's something I definitely don't regret ever doing.
translation.zh: 我肯定不会后悔选择了这条路

translation.en: Gaming is simply the proudest thing in my life.
translation.zh: 进入竞技圈 是我一生中最值得骄傲的事情

translation.en: [Dendi] It can be called "gamer," but for me, it's something different.
translation.zh: 可以叫我玩家 不过这对我来说有着特殊的意义

translation.en: One way to forget about pain is to do something that you will be in completely.
translation.zh: 忘记痛苦的一种方式 就是去做一件你会全情投入的事情

translation.en: So… computer games.
translation.zh: 所以 我选择了电脑游戏

translation.en: For me, it was… everything.
translation.zh: 对我而言这就是 我的一切

translation.en: [Fear] This is my career. I've chosen to do it for so long.
translation.zh: 这是我的事业 我选择一直走了这么久

translation.en: Success in my eyes is always based off on how other people see you.
translation.zh: 在我看来 成功总是基于他人对你的评价

translation.en: In the eyes of the public, it's up to them.
translation.zh: 是大众的看法 是他们的判断

translation.en: [hyhy] It's important to be doing things that you love and you really appreciate,
translation.zh: 做自己热爱并欣赏的事情非常重要

translation.en: because that's your passion, man.
translation.zh: 因为那是热情的所在

translation.en: You should… you should really work for your passions. Yeah.
translation.zh: 人总得为梦想活一次

translation.en: Okay, guys, you have… you have seven minutes to set everything up and then we go.
translation.zh: 好的 各位 还有七分钟的时间做准备 然后我们就开始

translation.en: [Fear] This is the first time I wanted to take something seriously
translation.zh: 这是我第一次如此认真对待一件事

translation.en: and do something good for my life.
translation.zh: 做一件对自己的一生有用的事

translation.en: [Troels] Ten years ago, competitive gaming wasn't even really a thing.
translation.zh: 十年以前甚至都没有竞技游戏的概念

translation.en: You'd play for fun against your friends.
translation.zh: 你和朋友对战只是为了娱乐

translation.en: Maybe you would play for a cup of coffee or whatever you wanted.
translation.zh: 也许你们会赌一杯咖啡什么的

translation.en: [Alexander] When I started playing, we'd been fighting for 24 bottles of beer as a first place.
translation.zh: 我最开始玩的时候 就是为了第一名的24瓶啤酒而战

translation.en: I'm not joking.
translation.zh: 我没开玩笑

translation.en: [Jon] From there, though, online happened.
translation.zh: 从那时候起 线上赛就开始了

translation.en: And, all of a sudden, you weren't just trying to be the best on your block.
translation.zh: 突然间 大家就不满足于 只是所在街区最棒的了

translation.en: [Jon] Now you're trying to be the best in the world.
translation.zh: 而是试图成为世界冠军

translation.en: And that opened up competitive gaming to a whole new landscape.
translation.zh: 这为竞技游戏开启了一个新的世界

translation.en: And one of the games really leading the way is Dota.
translation.zh: 而引领大家前行的其中一款游戏 就是《刀塔》

translation.en: [Liu] Dota is sort of a combination of football, or soccer for the Americans, and chess.
translation.zh: 《刀塔》有点像是 足球和国际象棋的结合

translation.en: This is probably how I would try to explain Dota to someone who's not familiar with it.
translation.zh: 如果要让我对不了解《刀塔》的人 解释 我就会这么说

translation.en: At least, that's what I did to my parents.
translation.zh: 至少我就是这么对我父母解释的

translation.en: [host] Dota is a game of momentum.
translation.zh: 《刀塔》是一个关乎气势的游戏

translation.en: You as five players
translation.zh: 你们五人一组

translation.en: try and battle against the other five players for momentum.
translation.zh: 和其他五名玩家对抗来获得气势

translation.en: Every single player controls one unit.
translation.zh: 每个玩家控制一个单位

translation.en: And the main objective of the game is to destroy the final enemy building
translation.zh: 游戏目标就是摧毁敌方的终极建筑

translation.en: which is called the "Ancient."
translation.zh: 这个建筑被称为遗迹

translation.en: [host] Everything else that happens in the meantime,
translation.zh: 同时发生的所有其他事情

translation.en: is your amazing filler of a game.
translation.zh: 正是这个游戏不可思议的地方

translation.en: [Jeremy] You could play 100 heroes in conjunction with 99 other heroes.
translation.zh: 有100个英雄供你选择使用 队友选从其他99个英雄中选择 互相配合

translation.en: It's just nonstop, uh, possibilities and it's so much fun.
translation.zh: 这游戏有着无穷的可能性 所以玩起来其乐无穷

translation.en: And, you know, it's like the same map every single time
translation.zh: 所以玩起来其乐无穷 而且虽然每次都是同一张地图

translation.en: but it literally never gets boring.
translation.zh: 但永远不会变得无趣

translation.en: [Jeremy] I would say Dota is a way of life.
translation.zh: 我觉得玩《刀塔》是一种生活方式

translation.en: [Clement] When prizes started coming, I was like, "Well, we have tournaments."
translation.zh: 当有人设立奖金时 我的想法就是 “我们有锦标赛了”

translation.en: So obviously some people are gonna come and say,
translation.zh: 显然就会有人说

translation.en: "This is a great game. Let's play it. Like, let's put money in it."
translation.zh: “这个游戏很棒 我们一起参与吧 也就是我们投资吧”

translation.en: [Clement] And it started progressing each year.
translation.zh: 而且投资一年比一年多

translation.en: [Tammy] Those at the top level,
translation.zh: 那些顶级的选手

translation.en: they just do like lots of calculations in their head.
translation.zh: 他们的脑中会进行很多运算

translation.en: Something like A Beautiful Mind where you see like all kinds of things.
translation.zh: 有点像《美丽心灵》里的天才 这些人能够预见到各种可能

translation.en: [Tammy] And using all this information, make your next move.
translation.zh: 并且利用这些的信息 来做出下一步动作

translation.en: I see it in a lot of ways similar to basketball.
translation.zh: 这和篮球有很多相似之处

translation.en: Just like a five-on-five game where you kind of have to work together
translation.zh: 都是五对五的比赛 大家都得齐心协力

translation.en: and utilize each other's strengths and synergizing everything together.
translation.zh: 充分利用每个人的特长并且团结协作

translation.en: The teamwork, and the trust, and the sacrifice,
translation.zh: 团队配合、信任和牺牲

translation.en: those are all true for every single team sport.
translation.zh: 每项团体运动都需要这些东西

translation.en: Dota is a game that unites everybody.
translation.zh: 《刀塔》这个游戏将所有人团结起来

translation.en: It doesn't matter what country or from what race you are.
translation.zh: 国籍和种族并不重要

translation.en: It's like a bond that is shared.
translation.zh: 这就像是一种连接彼此的纽带

translation.en: And when you're part of this tight-knit group of people,
translation.zh: 当你成为这个紧密团体的一员时

translation.en: it's like having a second family.
translation.zh: 他们就成了你的家人

translation.en: That's something you never let go.
translation.zh: 你永远不会放弃这种感情

translation.en: [Tammy] Everyone's searching for something.
translation.zh: 每个人都在追寻着什么 自我实现

translation.en: Fulfillment. Fame.
translation.zh: 每个人都在追寻着什么 自我实现 名誉

translation.en: Satisfaction.
translation.zh: 自我满足

translation.en: It gives you the ability to become someone else.
translation.zh: 它让你能够成为一个不同的人

translation.en: A someone who is powerful.
translation.zh: 一个强大的人

translation.en: Who can take down five opponents.
translation.zh: 一个能够解决五名对手的人

translation.en: Express their creativity.
translation.zh: 展现自身的创造力

translation.en: Break the rules without actually getting arrested.
translation.zh: 可以改写规则 还不用担心被抓起来

translation.en: All of these reasons are in there somewhere.
translation.zh: 这都是打这个游戏的原因

translation.en: The player himself might not even know. He might not even understand it himself.
translation.zh: 玩家自身可能都不会意识到 甚至可能都无法理解

translation.en: But it's there.
translation.zh: 但这就是理由 （谭米唐 战队经理）

translation.en: [Fear] Gaming fulfills my competitive need.
translation.zh: 游戏满足了我对竞技的渴望

translation.en: I'm a very competitive person.
translation.zh: 我是一个好胜心很强的人

translation.en: When it comes to sports, I consider gaming a sport.
translation.zh: 说到体育运动 我觉得游戏也是一种运动

translation.en: So I use my competitiveness and I fuel it with Dota.
translation.zh: 于是我充分发挥自己的好胜心 并用《刀塔》驱动着它

translation.en: So it fulfills that side of me completely.
translation.zh: 所以《刀塔》完全满足了 我的竞技需求

translation.en: Fear's one of the best in America, if not the best.
translation.zh: Fear是美国最优秀的选手 起码是其中之一吧

translation.en: He has a lot of experience.
translation.zh: 他经验老道

translation.en: He's one of the old hogs, basically.
translation.zh: 基本算是最老的一批选手了

translation.en: And he's generally just a calm guy. So, in my opinion, that's his strength.
translation.zh: 他通常十分冷静 所以在我看来 这是他的强项

translation.en: Really, good basketball player. I remember my coaches watch him playing
translation.zh: 打篮球真的很棒 我还记得我的教练看他打球

translation.en: and talk about picking him up the next year he came in.
translation.zh: 就说第二年他来的时候要把他招过来

translation.en: Always had nothing but good things to say, but he wasn't picked on the team.
translation.zh: 一谈起他总是溢美之词不断 不过他后来没有入选篮球队

translation.en: Just the reason was, yeah, he just wasn't tall enough, I guess.
translation.zh: 说到理由 我觉得是他不够高吧

translation.en: So, I know that, yeah, he found the game.
translation.zh: 我知道他后来发现了这个游戏 他完全投入其中

translation.en: He got really devoted in that and stuff and just found something else that worked.
translation.zh: 我知道他后来发现了这个游戏 他完全投入其中 找到了另外一件擅长的事

translation.en: [Karen] I was your typical parent.
translation.zh: 我是那种很传统的家长

translation.en: "Clinton, you're spending too much time playing computer games."
translation.zh: 我总是说 “克林顿 你玩游戏的时间太长了”

translation.en: "You need to go to school. You need to go to college."
translation.zh: “你该去上学了 你得上大学啊”

translation.en: [Karen] And he would tell me,
translation.zh: 然后他就会说

translation.en: "I want to be able to play games and get paid for it."
translation.zh: “我想有人给我发工资让我玩游戏”

translation.en: Now, he said this at a very young age before Dota ever came along.
translation.zh: 他很小的时候就说了这句话 当时还没有《刀塔》

translation.en: [Karen] And I thought, well, you know, he's gonna grow out of it.
translation.zh: 我就想：“好吧 他总会长大的”

translation.en: He's gonna get sick and tired of sitting there in front of that computer and playing.
translation.zh: 一直坐在那里玩游戏 总有一天他会觉得没意思的

translation.en: Never did. Never did.
translation.zh: 结果他根本没有 从来没有

translation.en: [hyhy] In Singapore, the families actually put a lot of stress on us
translation.zh: 在新加坡 家人给我们的压力很大

translation.en: in terms of our education.
translation.zh: 主要是在教育方面

translation.en: I would say it's been tough on me
translation.zh: 我一直觉得很不容易

translation.en: trying to juggle both studies and gaming at the same time.
translation.zh: 同时兼顾学业和打游戏

translation.en: My grades have dropped for two years already.
translation.zh: 我的学习成绩连续两年下滑

translation.en: And my parents have treated the gaming as the cause of it.
translation.zh: 我的父母认为是游戏导致的

translation.en: I mean, there was this phrase that they used.
translation.zh: 他们以前常说一句话

translation.en: They said, "Gaming will be the death of you one day."
translation.zh: “游戏总有一天会害死你的”

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -[all cheer]
translation.zh: Micronology!

translation.en: [Toh] He's a great player and a great captain.
translation.zh: 他是一个伟大的选手 一个伟大的队长

translation.en: I would say he's the top player in Singapore.
translation.zh: 在我看来他是新加坡最顶尖的选手

translation.en: Easily.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问

translation.en: [hyhy] My parents and my… my family,
translation.zh: 我的父母和家人

translation.en: they don't actually speak much of my gaming career.
translation.zh: 并没有过多提及我的职业电竞生涯

translation.en: They don't tell their friends and my other relatives
translation.zh: 他们没有告诉他们的亲戚朋友

translation.en: that I'm actually that good at my games.
translation.zh: 其实我是游戏高手

translation.en: All along they have only been bragging about my studies.
translation.zh: 他们一直都是对外人说我学习很好

translation.en: Because I used to be an "A" student.
translation.zh: 因为我以前是尖子生

translation.en: Yeah, they go on and on. And…
translation.zh: 他们一直对别人这么说啊说

translation.en: And it seemed like that was the only thing they could ever be proud of.
translation.zh: 这好像是他们唯一感觉骄傲的事情

translation.en: [hyhy] Actually, there has only been one person
translation.zh: 其实一直以来只有一个人

translation.en: that has always been very supportive of me gaming.
translation.zh: 从始至终支持我的电竞生涯

translation.en: And that was, uh, my ex-girlfriend, Huayan.
translation.zh: 就是我的前女友华燕

translation.en: She's from the female Dota team in Singapore.
translation.zh: 她是新加坡女子刀塔战队的成员

translation.en: There are a lot of things that we share in life.
translation.zh: 我们在生活中有很多共同之处

translation.en: So many things.
translation.zh: 很多很多

translation.en: In my case, it felt really good, you know, to have someone
translation.zh: 对我来说 这种感觉真的很好 就是有一个人发自内心地 欣赏我最擅长的事情

translation.en: who truly appreciated what you did best and loved you for it.
translation.zh: 就是有一个人发自内心地 欣赏我最擅长的事情 并且因此爱上我

translation.en: She was aware of what I'm doing and what I'm passionate about.
translation.zh: 她很明白我做的事情 很明白我的热情所在

translation.en: The breakup was her decision and I respected it.
translation.zh: 分手是她提的 我尊重她的选择

translation.en: We'd been together for close to three years
translation.zh: 我们在一起快三年

translation.en: and ever since the breakup, I haven't gotten over it.
translation.zh: 分手后 我到现在还没有走出来

translation.en: I recall the last time she spoke to me she named me as a bastard, so…
translation.zh: 我还记得她最后一次跟我说话时 她说我是个混蛋

translation.en: We're not in contact anymore, yeah, but…
translation.zh: 我们不再联系了 只是…

translation.en: life goes on, yeah.
translation.zh: 生活还是要继续

translation.en: -[man singing] -[gentle music playing]
translation.zh: （乌克兰利沃夫）

translation.en: [Dendi] I'm from Ukraine. My nickname is Dendi.
translation.zh: 我来自乌克兰 我的昵称是Dendi

translation.en: I finished my university,
translation.zh: 我读完了大学以后

translation.en: and I'm just playing computer games right now.
translation.zh: 现在是一名职业电竞选手

translation.en: [in Russian] He was doing music. He played the piano.
translation.zh: 他以前学音乐 练过钢琴

translation.en: [Irina, in Russian] He was doing dancing.
translation.zh: 他以前还跳舞

translation.en: At school, he had musical plays in which he played the main role.
translation.zh: 他在学校还出演过音乐剧的主角

translation.en: Audiences were always impressed by his artistic ability.
translation.zh: 观众们都被他的艺术才华所征服

translation.en: When their kids' group was showing, Danil would always stand out.
translation.zh: 当一帮孩子演出时 丹尼尔总是最出众的那个

translation.en: [Katya] When we were growing up,
translation.zh: 在我们小时候

translation.en: it wasn't a good time financially for our family.
translation.zh: 家里的经济条件并不是很好

translation.en: But my grandma helped us to get our first computer in 1997.
translation.zh: 不过奶奶还是在1997年 为我们买了第一台电脑

translation.en: Early, compared with other kids in Ukraine.
translation.zh: 比其他乌克兰的孩子都要早

translation.en: We got visitors every day.
translation.zh: 每天都有人到我们家里来玩

translation.en: The friends of my older brother used to come to visit us
translation.zh: 我哥哥的朋友以前也总来串门

translation.en: and we were playing games.
translation.zh: 我们一起玩游戏

translation.en: [Artem] And Danil, every time looked at what we do.
translation.zh: 丹尼尔每次都会来看我们玩

translation.en: Every time we would try to push him away but he would come back and look again.
translation.zh: 每次我们都把他赶走 但是他总是又跑回来看

translation.en: [Irina, in Russian] It was more prominent with him than with other kids.
translation.zh: 他小时候对电脑的兴趣 比其他小孩都要强烈

translation.en: During all his conscious life we were trying to stop him from playing.
translation.zh: 从他记事开始 我们就一直在想方设法他让不玩游戏

translation.en: [Katya] We were hiding our computer cord everywhere in our apartment,
translation.zh: 我们把电脑电源线藏起来 家里到处都藏过了

translation.en: but he always found it.
translation.zh: 但他总是能找到

translation.en: [in Russian] I always wanted to understand him better.
translation.zh: 我总是想多了解他一点

translation.en: Including that hobby, I wanted to understand him better.
translation.zh: 包括游戏这一爱好 我一直想去更了解他

translation.en: [Irina, in Russian] There were certain reasons. I'm not going to mention them now.
translation.zh: 其中有某些原因 我现在不想再提了

translation.en: I think somewhere deep inside he's a little bit sad.
translation.zh: 我认为他在内心深处总是有一些悲伤

translation.en: [Katya] Uh, she stopped preventing him from playing Dota.
translation.zh: 她后来就不拦着他玩《刀塔》

translation.en: She gave Dendi the freedom to choose what is the best for him and his life.
translation.zh: 她给了Dendi自由来选择 什么对自己及自己的一生最好的

translation.en: [Dominik] Tournaments back then were like really low prizes.
translation.zh: （《刀塔2》国际邀请赛） 当时的比赛奖金真的很低

translation.en: And a lot of prize money didn't even get to the players.
translation.zh: 甚至很多比赛奖金都发不到选手手上

translation.en: There's been a lot of scams with the managers and stuff like that.
translation.zh: 经理们总是做一些坑人的事

translation.en: [Dominik] There were, like, some rumors that it's gonna be, like, 50,000 dollars, first place,
translation.zh: 传闻说冠军能拿到五万美元

translation.en: and everyone was going, like, "Nah, it's not gonna be like that."
translation.zh: 然后每个人都觉得这不可能

translation.en: [host] Watch the forums go nuts, guys.
translation.zh: 大家快来看 整个论坛都疯了

translation.en: Watch the forums go nuts.
translation.zh: 整个论坛都疯了

translation.en: It is actually confirmed.
translation.zh: 已经确认了

translation.en: It is off the fricking hook.
translation.zh: 远超从前

translation.en: 1.6-million-dollar prize pool!
translation.zh: 160万美元奖金池

translation.en: That is for the winner, one million dollars for winning Dota!
translation.zh: 而刀塔比赛的冠军 将拿到100万美元

translation.en: [Rasmus] Dota, the game I've played for five years now,
translation.zh: 刀塔 我玩了5年的游戏

translation.en: which I played for fun, for some food money or whatever, you know,
translation.zh: 我用来娱乐的游戏 挣点吃饭钱什么的

translation.en: okay, it's actually getting big.
translation.zh: 好吧 它开始火了

translation.en: It's the largest prize pool of any gaming competition to date.
translation.zh: 这是当时电竞比赛历史上 最高的奖金池

translation.en: [Tammy] It just felt like the start of something big.
translation.zh: 感觉就像一件大事就要发生

translation.en: Like a revolution.
translation.zh: 比如一场革命

translation.en: [Rasmus] You know, we had everything we needed
translation.zh: 我们所需要的一切已经就位

translation.en: for the game to become big and respected as an E-Sport.
translation.zh: 可以让这款游戏作为电子竞技 进入公众视线 并受到尊重

translation.en: It would kind of like vindicate us.
translation.zh: 这有点像是可以证明我们没错

translation.en: [Tammy] We're not just playing because we're addicted.
translation.zh: 我们并不是因为上瘾了才玩游戏

translation.en: There's a goal, a motive.
translation.zh: 我们有了目标 有了动力

translation.en: That we can actually reach out and grab if we are good enough.
translation.zh: 只要我们足够优秀 就能达到目标

translation.en: Over in Asia, professional gamers are treated like rock stars.
translation.zh: 在整个亚洲 职业玩家的待遇和摇滚明星差不多

translation.en: It's a viable career opportunity.
translation.zh: 成为职业选手是一条可行的道路

translation.en: They actually live in gamer houses.
translation.zh: 选手住在训练基地里

translation.en: So it's set up to be a thing all year long.
translation.zh: 所以全年都是在做这一件事情

translation.en: I think their approach to practice is that it's like a day job.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们把训练看成日常工作

translation.en: [Liu] The fan base is immense.
translation.zh: 中国的粉丝基础非常庞大

translation.en: It probably is as big as the whole Western audience together. Or even more than that.
translation.zh: 可能和整个西方社会的受众一样多 甚至更多

translation.en: So now you really have to play good. You really have to try hard.
translation.zh: 所以你必须非常厉害 你必须努力奋斗

translation.en: [Fear] It's first place. It's go big or go home.
translation.zh: 目标就是第一名 要么赢 要么回家

translation.en: The big teams get big money.
translation.zh: 名次靠前才能拿大奖

translation.en: But the 9th to 16th place earn nothing.
translation.zh: 然而9到16名什么都没有

translation.en: And their salaries are not worth considering.
translation.zh: 他们的工资不值一提

translation.en: While in sports, you have a salary that you can live on.
translation.zh: 而在体育界 至少有一份能维持生计的工资

translation.en: [Jeremy] With pro gaming, I think that's one of the toughest parts
translation.zh: 在职业电竞行业 我认为最难的一点就是

translation.en: is living game to game. It's like living paycheck to paycheck.
translation.zh: 要不断打比赛才能活下去 就像完全靠薪水度日

translation.en: Like, I have to win. If I don't win, I don't get paid.
translation.zh: 感觉就是必须赢 如果输了就没工资了

translation.en: [Jeremy] That's tough for anybody. It doesn't matter what you're doing.
translation.zh: 这种生活对任何人来说都很难 和从事哪一行无关

translation.en: [Karen] When your child wants to become a professional gamer,
translation.zh: 当你的孩子想成为一名职业玩家时

translation.en: you don't have any history to look back on like other sports.
translation.zh: 你并没有这方面的经验可以借鉴 这和其他体育运动不一样

translation.en: I don't know anybody who's made a living at gaming.
translation.zh: 我认识的人里没有靠玩游戏 来养家糊口的

translation.en: So it's kind of a scary thing
translation.zh: 所以这很让人害怕

translation.en: when you see your kid putting their whole life into gaming
translation.zh: 因为你看着自己的孩子 把一辈子都投入到游戏中

translation.en: and not college and not the traditional things.
translation.zh: 而不是上大学或者其他传统行业

translation.en: [Karen] What if nothing comes of it?
translation.zh: 要是打不出成绩怎么办？

translation.en: [Alexander] Regarding the age, I think, yes,
translation.zh: 对于选手年龄 我认为

translation.en: like, 25, 26 years. It's absolutely maximum for E-Sports.
translation.zh: 25、26岁已经是电竞选手的极限了

translation.en: [Alexander] Because 27, 28, 29, 30, your reaction time is lowering
translation.zh: 因为过了26岁以后 你的临场反应时间就会变长

translation.en: and you can't click so much, you know… [chuckles] …as the kids do.
translation.zh: 和小孩子比起来点鼠标也会变慢

translation.en: A lot of financial responsibilities are laid upon me right now.
translation.zh: 我现在肩负着很多经济方面的责任

translation.en: Require me to be successful in something or have a job.
translation.zh: 这就要求我必须在某些事情上成功 或者找个工作

translation.en: So it's pretty critical that I am successful
translation.zh: 所以我必须成功 这很关键

translation.en: if I wanna keep continue, like, the gaming career.
translation.zh: 这样我才能继续我的职业生涯

translation.en: He's an A-Star student, you know?
translation.zh: 他是一个优等生 你知道吗？

translation.en: Because of this gaming, it pulled him right down.
translation.zh: 但因为游戏 他成绩直线下滑

translation.en: It's very sad for me.
translation.zh: 这让我很难受

translation.en: [Vicky] So here… the bad one is Auntie.
translation.zh: 这让我很难受 我这个阿姨总是当坏人的

translation.en: Auntie is the one that always comes here and nag, nag, nag, nag, nag.
translation.zh: 我总是走到他边上 不停地唠叨唠叨

translation.en: -Am I right? -It's tough being a gamer.
translation.zh: -我说的没错吧 -当一名职业电竞选手很难

translation.en: -Huh? Sorry? Am I right? -I said, it's tough being a gamer.
translation.zh: -什么？我说的没错吧？ -我说做一名职业电竞选手很难

translation.en: Huh, hy? Why? Multi-millionaire.
translation.zh: hy？百万富翁

translation.en: For gaming, huh?
translation.zh: 游戏界的富翁 是吧

translation.en: Huh? Sorry, you are not.
translation.zh: 对不起 你不是

translation.en: Huh? What, what is your view? What is your plan?
translation.zh: 你有什么想法？有什么计划？

translation.en: That is more important.
translation.zh: 那些才是更重要的

translation.en: I mean, we speak ourselves. We speak our frank opinion. This is your choice now.
translation.zh: 我是说 我们有话直说 开诚布公 到你做出选择的时候了

translation.en: What do you want in life? That is more important.
translation.zh: 你这辈子想要什么？这才是最重要的

translation.en: [hyhy] If I'm gonna win this tournament, my first thought would be,
translation.zh: 如果我赢得这次比赛 我的第一个念头会是

translation.en: I will call my… my ex-girlfriend.
translation.zh: 打电话给我的前女友

translation.en: Things got really bad between us, and…
translation.zh: 我们之前弄得很不愉快

translation.en: but right now, for me, if I'm gonna win this tournament,
translation.zh: 不过现在对我来说 如果我赢下这次比赛

translation.en: my first thought would be, I would call her. I'd tell her about it, and…
translation.zh: 我的第一个念头会是给她打电话 告诉她我赢了

translation.en: I want to share this moment with her. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我想和她分享那一刻 就是这样

translation.en: [James] This tournament is gonna be a moment in every gamer's life.
translation.zh: 这次比赛会是每个选手 生命中难忘的一刻

translation.en: Everything that you've been doing is building up
translation.zh: 你所做的一切 所有的积累

translation.en: and is gonna happen over one week.
translation.zh: 都将在这一周内集中展现

translation.en: [James] And then it's not one week anymore, it's one game.
translation.zh: 然后就不是一周了 而是一场比赛

translation.en: And then it's not that one game, it's that one moment in the game.
translation.zh: 然后也不是那一场比赛 而是比赛中的某个时刻

translation.en: And then that one moment in the game is where it's gonna finish.
translation.zh: 那一刻将会是你的终场谢幕

translation.en: And how's it gonna finish? Are you gonna be holding up a trophy?
translation.zh: 然而谢幕的方式是怎样呢？ 会高举奖杯谢幕吗？

translation.en: Or are you gonna be the most disappointed that you've ever been?
translation.zh: 还是这一刻 将成为你生命中最大的遗憾？

translation.en: It's Tuesday. So one day before the event. We already have a lot of setup.
translation.zh: （德国科隆） 今天是星期二 离比赛开始还有一天 我们已经准备了很多

translation.en: We have a lot of computer setup right here.
translation.zh: 我们在这里准备了很多电脑

translation.en: The whole booth construction is pretty much finished.
translation.zh: 整个选手间的搭建也基本完成了

translation.en: So five players per side. They can see each other through the glass.
translation.zh: 每一边有五名选手 他们可以透过玻璃看到彼此

translation.en: [host] They can't hear each other. This booth is soundproofed up.
translation.zh: 但听不到对方说话 整个选手间都是隔音的

translation.en: Plus, the whole setup here,
translation.zh: 另外 整个比赛场地的搭建

translation.en: if you look from above looks exactly like a Dota map.
translation.zh: 如果从上面俯视 它看上去和刀塔地图一模一样

translation.en: [host] And this is the mid. This is where it all happens.
translation.zh: 这是中路 也就是比赛进行的地方

translation.en: [Moritz] A few teams have already arrived this morning.
translation.zh: 不少队伍在今早已经到了

translation.en: We had a lot of teams from Singapore. We have China.
translation.zh: 我们有很多队伍是从新加坡来的

translation.en: We had Malaysia coming in and Russia.
translation.zh: 还有中国的、马来西亚的 以及俄罗斯的

translation.en: And, uh, tomorrow it's finally happening.
translation.zh: 明天大赛终于要开始了

translation.en: [host] We're here live at Gamescom 2011 in beautiful Cologne.
translation.zh: 这里是2011年 科隆Gamescom的现场直播

translation.en: It's the first day of the event.
translation.zh: 今天是赛事第一天

translation.en: We've got some of the world's best teams here in Dota.
translation.zh: 这里有全世界最顶尖的刀塔队伍

translation.en: And they're handing out a tournament prize of 1.6 million dollars!
translation.zh: 主办方将会发出160万美元的奖金

translation.en: [host] It is massive here.
translation.zh: 这里盛况空前

translation.en: A tournament of 1.6 million dollars. That's the future of gaming.
translation.zh: 一个160万美元的比赛 这是电子竞技的未来

translation.en: This is awesome!
translation.zh: 这真是太棒了

translation.en: [host] It's the first time we're gonna see teams of this caliber assembled in one location.
translation.zh: 这是我们第一次看到 如此水准的队伍汇集一堂

translation.en: These guys are not just nameless faces.
translation.zh: 这些人并不是无名之辈

translation.en: They're the best in the world.
translation.zh: 他们是世界顶尖选手

translation.en: [Troels] The bunch of teams we have here,
translation.zh: 在我们邀请到的队伍中

translation.en: there's a few teams that have individual skill that's unbelievable.
translation.zh: 有几支队伍的选手 有着难以置信的个人能力

translation.en: And then there's a big group of other teams
translation.zh: 而很大一部分队伍

translation.en: that have good individual skill, not top-notch,
translation.zh: 队员的个人水平也很出色 即便不是最好的

translation.en: but who win through good strategy and team play.
translation.zh: 但是通过策略和团队合作取得胜利

translation.en: [Troels] Fear is a great player, for example,
translation.zh: 比如说Fear是名非常优秀的选手

translation.en: but he is not comparable to good players in Asia.
translation.zh: 但是无法与亚洲的顶级选手相提并论

translation.en: that's nothing against Fear. He's still an excellent player,
translation.zh: 不是说Fear不好 因为他的确实力超群

translation.en: but he's not them.
translation.zh: 但他毕竟不是亚洲选手

translation.en: [commentator] "Kim Jung Woo!"
translation.zh: 金正友

translation.en: [James] Over in Asia, they take gaming so much more seriously.
translation.zh: 亚洲整体对待电竞的态度更为严肃

translation.en: Just to give you an example,
translation.zh: 给你举个例子

translation.en: the Korean football team were playing in the World Cup.
translation.zh: 韩国足球队参加世界杯时

translation.en: [James] To motivate the Korean football team to play better,
translation.zh: 为了激发队员们的士气 踢出更好的水平

translation.en: they brought in StarCraft: Brood War professional gamers
translation.zh: 他们会在上场前 安排《星际争霸》的职业选手 来到更衣室

translation.en: into their locker room before they went out
translation.zh: 安排《星际争霸》的职业选手 来到更衣室

translation.en: so that they got to meet what were their heroes.
translation.zh: 以便他们与自己心中的英雄相见

translation.en: [Tammy] In China, Dota is to the people there
translation.zh: 在中国 《刀塔》对人们的意义 就像《星际争霸》 对韩国人的意义一样

translation.en: what StarCraft is to Korea.
translation.zh: 就像《星际争霸》 对韩国人的意义一样

translation.en: Um, it's televised.
translation.zh: 电视台会直播比赛

translation.en: The girls like their boyfriends to be Dota players.
translation.zh: 女生们都想她们的男朋友 成为刀塔职业选手 偶像

translation.en: After a game, when they're walking around you can see fans running up to them
translation.zh: 比赛结束以后 当他们离开时 粉丝们都会向着他们冲过去 请他们在自己的衣服上签名

translation.en: asking them to sign on their shirts.
translation.zh: 粉丝们都会向着他们冲过去 请他们在自己的衣服上签名

translation.en: It's like a real sport.
translation.zh: 就像传统体育一样

translation.en: The third time I was in China, I was playing with fans for two days.
translation.zh: 我第三次去中国的时候 我和粉丝们一起玩了两天

translation.en: [Rasmus] They made a video of me, filming me walking in some mountains
translation.zh: 他们为我做了个视频 拍下了我去登山的情景

translation.en: and I had to say some sentences and stuff.
translation.zh: 我还得对着镜头说话

translation.en: And I was like, yeah, "In Dota, there's always a new mountain to climb."
translation.zh: 我当时说 “在刀塔界 总有新的大山要翻越”

translation.en: Stuff like this, you know, and, uh…
translation.zh: 诸如此类的话

translation.en: I walked up and down these stairs
translation.zh: 我来回地爬着阶梯

translation.en: and started running and lifting some weights,
translation.zh: 还跑了步 举了重

translation.en: just to compare this with Dota like some metaphor and stuff.
translation.zh: 就是为了把《刀塔》比喻成这些运动

translation.en: [Tang, in Chinese] E-Sports in China is already a sport
translation.zh: 电子竞技它在中国

translation.en: that is recognized by the General Administration of Sport.
translation.zh: 它就是一个 被国家体育总局承认的体育项目

translation.en: It is the same as tennis, ping pong, chess.
translation.zh: 它跟羽毛球、乒乓球、象棋一样

translation.en: The only thing is that it is not an Olympic sport.
translation.zh: 只不过它是一个非奥项目

translation.en: [hyhy] I will say that China teams are all great.
translation.zh: 我要说中国的队伍都很厉害

translation.en: Every player in the team is strong.
translation.zh: 队里的每个选手都很强

translation.en: You don't recognize China players as a player.
translation.zh: 中国选手并不是因个人而受到认可

translation.en: You just recognize them as a whole team. You just fear the whole team.
translation.zh: 而是他们组成的战队被人们所认可 你会对畏惧整个队伍

translation.en: [James] The Chinese teams that have come to this competition
translation.zh: 来到这次比赛的中国队伍

translation.en: are scaring the shit out of everyone else.
translation.zh: 把其他人直接吓得屁滚尿流

translation.en: We had two of the top Chinese teams in our group.
translation.zh: 我们的组里有两支中国的顶级队伍

translation.en: [Liu] Online Kingdom has not been regarded as one of the favorites to win it.
translation.zh: 一直以来Online Kingdom 都不是人们心头的赢家

translation.en: In fact, they were considered bottom four or just bottom eight for sure.
translation.zh: 事实上 他们被认为是倒数四名以内 或者至少是倒数八名

translation.en: [Fear] This is our first time on LAN together.
translation.zh: 这是我们第一次在线下打比赛

translation.en: The team together has only been around for around four-five months
translation.zh: 这支队伍成形才四五个月

translation.en: so it's a relatively new team.
translation.zh: 因此这是一支相对较新的队伍

translation.en: And Pajkatt, our newest addition, playing Carry for us,
translation.zh: 而Pajkatt是最新加入的队员 在队中扮演核心的角色

translation.en: he's only been on the team for three weeks now actually.
translation.zh: 事实上他加入战队才三个星期

translation.en: [Fear] We were really nervous going against a Chinese team
translation.zh: 和中国队伍打 我们非常紧张

translation.en: especially the top Chinese teams.
translation.zh: 尤其是顶级的中国队伍

translation.en: [James] There's gonna be players that choke
translation.zh: 尤其是顶级的中国队伍 如此年轻的选手们面对这种压力 难免发挥失常

translation.en: handling this kind of pressure at such a young age.
translation.zh: 如此年轻的选手们面对这种压力 难免发挥失常

translation.en: [Fear] 1437, like, this is the first time he's, like, ever been on LAN.
translation.zh: 而1437这名选手 也是首次参加线下比赛

translation.en: It's not easy, like, this is a million-dollar tournament.
translation.zh: 这可不简单 这可是百万美元大赛

translation.en: First time he's been on LAN.
translation.zh: 而且这是他第一次线下赛

translation.en: [James] This stage. This prize money. This prestige.
translation.zh: 这种大场合 如此高的奖金和出名机会

translation.en: This is real competition.
translation.zh: 这是真正意义上的比赛

translation.en: [Fear] We tried to keep our cool together and we just played our game.
translation.zh: 我们努力让自己保持冷静 正常发挥就可以了

translation.en: Passive shields!
translation.zh: 套盾

translation.en: [Dominik] We were super hyped.
translation.zh: 我们当时超级兴奋

translation.en: Everyone was surprised we were doing so good.
translation.zh: 我们当时超级兴奋 我们的表现惊艳全场 连我们自己都觉得难以置信

translation.en: Even we couldn't believe it.
translation.zh: 我们的表现惊艳全场 连我们自己都觉得难以置信

translation.en: [host] Online Kingdom dominating right now.
translation.zh: Online Kingdom正在主宰比赛

translation.en: [Fear] After the match against TyLoo, everyone was very excited, you know.
translation.zh: 对天禄的比赛结束以后 大家都很兴奋

translation.en: We just beat one of the teams that were actually favored to win the competition.
translation.zh: 我们刚击败的可是夺冠热门队伍

translation.en: So everyone's, like, spirits were like,
translation.zh: 所以大家都士气高涨 就觉得

translation.en: "Oh, we may be actually able to do this, you know."
translation.zh: 我们可能真的能赢得冠军了

translation.en: Beating the Chinese teams, some people just, you know, for fun, they started,
translation.zh: 击败了中国队伍以后 有的人就开始开玩笑说

translation.en: "Okay, hey, it's OK.Nirvana.Int. They're the China slayers."
translation.zh: 你看 是OK.Nirvana.Int 他们是中国队克星

translation.en: [Liu] A few little bit surprises that we had yesterday. Quite a few upsets.
translation.zh: （第2天 共5天 双淘汰开始） 昨天发生了不少出人意料的事 好几个比赛都爆冷

translation.en: OK.Nirvana.International managing to beat two Chinese teams in a row,
translation.zh: OK.Nirvana.International连续 击败了两支中国队伍

translation.en: beating out TyLoo and OK.Nirvana.CN.
translation.zh: 击败了天禄和OK.Nirvana.CN

translation.en: [Liu] They're currently on a roll now. And, um, Chinese teams are not unbeatable.
translation.zh: 他们现在势头不错 中国队伍也不是无法击败的嘛

translation.en: But, um, on the other hand,
translation.zh: 不过另一方面

translation.en: EHOME are just proving that they are the strongest of the four Chinese teams
translation.zh: EHOME证明了他们 是四支中国队伍里最强的

translation.en: having a clean 3-0 record.
translation.zh: 干净利落的三胜零负

translation.en: They are the favorites to win the whole tournament.
translation.zh: 他们是夺冠呼声最高的队伍

translation.en: So they come in with the confidence
translation.zh: 因此他们信心满满

translation.en: that they've won so many championships already.
translation.zh: 特别是他们已经赢得了无数的冠军

translation.en: [Liu] It's always a little bit of national pride at stake.
translation.zh: 这里面总有一些国家荣誉感

translation.en: So, of course, they wanna prove that Chinese Dota is still a little bit above the rest.
translation.zh: 所以他们当然想证明 中国刀塔还是领先世界的

translation.en: [Liu] EHOME is one of the oldest Chinese Dota organizations.
translation.zh: EHOME是中国老牌的刀塔俱乐部之一

translation.en: They've always been at the top of competitive gaming.
translation.zh: 他们一直是电子竞技的豪门战队

translation.en: Most memorably at ESWC 2010.
translation.zh: 令人印象最深刻的是 2010年电子竞技世界杯

translation.en: [Pajkatt] Before ESWC 2010,
translation.zh: 在那次比赛之前

translation.en: I thought, "Okay, the Chinese, they're probably pretty good,
translation.zh: 我的想法是 “好吧 中国队伍 他们可能还不错吧

translation.en: but like, how good can they be?"
translation.zh: 但是到底能有多厉害”

translation.en: [Pajkatt] And then we played EHOME
translation.zh: 然后我们当时就和后来夺冠的 EHOME进行了比赛

translation.en: who won that tournament without losing a single match.
translation.zh: 然后我们当时就和后来夺冠的 EHOME进行了比赛 整个ESWC他们未尝一败 他们就那样碾压了所有队伍

translation.en: Like, they just crushed every team.
translation.zh: 整个ESWC他们未尝一败 他们就那样碾压了所有队伍

translation.en: [Liu] EHOME finished the year as the best team in the history of Dota.
translation.zh: EHOME带着刀塔历史上最辉煌的 成绩结束了那一年

translation.en: [Pajkatt] They were on a totally different level.
translation.zh: 他们的水平比其他人高出太多

translation.en: Like, they had their manager sitting behind them. He was making their calls.
translation.zh: 比如 他们的经理就坐在他们后面 是他在做各种决策

translation.en: He was running around with this little black book.
translation.zh: 他还一直随身带着他的小黑本

translation.en: And they were the first team I heard of who did that.
translation.zh: 我头一回听说有队伍如此专业

translation.en: [James] The EHOME manager copying down the draft, doing the prep work.
translation.zh: EHOME的经理记下了英雄阵容 做了准备工作

translation.en: He was their coach.
translation.zh: 他就相当于队员们的教练

translation.en: There was a great interview that was done.
translation.zh: 当时有一篇很不错的采访

translation.en: And it lined up all the top European captains who attended
translation.zh: 采访里列出了所有参加比赛的 欧洲顶级队长

translation.en: and the topic was EHOME.
translation.zh: 主题是EHOME

translation.en: If you want to ever play good, you don't need to invite Chinese teams
translation.zh: 如果你想在比赛里拿个好名次 千万别邀请中国队伍参赛

translation.en: -because they are too strong. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 因为他们实在太强了

translation.en: [interviewer] So EHOME won, uh…
translation.zh: 然后EHOME赢了

translation.en: What do you think of, of the Chinese guys?
translation.zh: 你对中国选手有什么看法？

translation.en: I never felt this outplayed in my entire life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子都没被打得这么惨过

translation.en: Uh, it's unbelievable how good they are. Like, their timing, their discipline…
translation.zh: 他们的技术好得难以置信 比如他们对时机的把握 他们的纪律性

translation.en: They're in control of the whole game, and they keep this control all the time.
translation.zh: 他们掌控了比赛 整场比赛 而且他们能每场都保持这种掌控力

translation.en: This is really crazy to see, actually.
translation.zh: 这样的场面真是太疯狂了

translation.en: [in Chinese] It's because when we are at any international tournament,
translation.zh: 是因为我们在任何国际赛场的时候

translation.en: when all of the foreign team managers and team members see us,
translation.zh: 所有的国外战队的经理和队员 看到我们的时候

translation.en: everyone will all yell out, "EHOME!"
translation.zh: 全体都会大声地喊 “EHOME”

translation.en: EHOME! EHOME!
translation.zh: EHOME

translation.en: [in Chinese] Do you know how spectacular that is?
translation.zh: 你知道那是一个多么壮观的场面吗？

translation.en: Actually, this is a story. It's a custom.
translation.zh: 这是一个故事 是一个风俗

translation.en: [Tang, in Chinese] Which is when everyone sees EHOME,
translation.zh: 当大家看到EHOME的时候

translation.en: they naturally think the king is entering.
translation.zh: 他们就自然而然地认为王者要入场了

translation.en: [hyhy] During this trip to The International,
translation.zh: 其实这次国际邀请赛的时间安排

translation.en: it's actually the same period as my exam periods.
translation.zh: 跟我的考试时间是完全冲突的

translation.en: So I treated it as a sacrifice that I've made… that I've made
translation.zh: 所以我这次放弃了考试

translation.en: for the team and for myself.
translation.zh: 是为整个队伍 也是为我自己所做的牺牲

translation.en: And I find that when it comes to pursuing your passions
translation.zh: 而我发现 每当追求自己的挚爱时

translation.en: it's really up to you to decide if it's worth, uh… worth the sacrifice.
translation.zh: 决定放弃是否值得的人其实是你自己

translation.en: When they're having exams, they don't allow him to leave the school
translation.zh: （新加坡） 当学校有考试的时候 校方是不会允许他离开学校的

translation.en: So I told him really I said, "Mind yourself."
translation.zh: 所以我告诉他：“你好自为之”

translation.en: [hyhy] Setting out on a career in gaming is risky. It's very risky.
translation.zh: 职业电竞选手这条路风险非常大

translation.en: Because the examinations actually clash with the competition
translation.zh: 因为考试和比赛的时间总是冲突

translation.en: and missing the exams without a proper explanation,
translation.zh: 所以无故缺席考试

translation.en: the school didn't recognize the Dota competition as a valid reason.
translation.zh: 校方才不承认参加 《刀塔》比赛是正当理由

translation.en: [hyhy] It's kind of breaking school rules.
translation.zh: 这已经算是违反校规了

translation.en: The school is determined to stop him from pursuing his chance of going for this contest.
translation.zh: 学校态度坚决地阻止他争取参赛机会

translation.en: [Edwin] So I, I think this has created a big stress for the family.
translation.zh: 因此我觉得他给这个家庭 带来了很大的压力

translation.en: Gives his mother very headache, you know?
translation.zh: （本尼迪克的阿姨 本尼迪克的母亲） 让他妈妈非常头疼

translation.en: [Vicky] It's quite difficult for us to pull him out right now, I think.
translation.zh: 但是我觉得 现在要把他拉出来很难了

translation.en: You know, he's so adamant about it.
translation.zh: 他在这件事情上很坚决

translation.en: So that's why when he told me he's going in August,
translation.zh: 所以当他告诉我 他8月要去参赛的时候

translation.en: I said, "Then how about your school exams?
translation.zh: 我就问他 “那你学校的考试怎么办？

translation.en: What are you going to do?"
translation.zh: 你准备怎么办？”

translation.en: [hyhy] I think my mother, she was kind of at her limits, telling me about how much gaming has been weighing me down.
translation.zh: 我觉得我母亲在说游戏拖累我 这件事情上 已经说的够多了

translation.en: That was really the talk when I really opened my heart, and I…
translation.zh: 所以那次谈话我完全敞开了心

translation.en: shared with her my passion for the game and how much I believed that.
translation.zh: 我向她倾诉了我对游戏的激情 以及我坚信

translation.en: [hyhy] My team actually has the potential to win,
translation.zh: 我的队伍有机会夺冠

translation.en: to be the best in the world.
translation.zh: 成为世界第一

translation.en: So we are stopping at nothing less than first.
translation.zh: 所以我们不夺冠的话绝不会停下

translation.en: This is how I tried to put it across to my mom.
translation.zh: 这就是我试着让我母亲理解我的方式

translation.en: By giving up so much to come here
translation.zh: 为了到这里来我放弃了很多

translation.en: I have absolute confidence in my team that we will win.
translation.zh: 我绝对相信我的队伍能够夺冠

translation.en: [host] All right, the draft is under way.
translation.zh: 现在正在挑选上场的英雄阵容

translation.en: EHOME, they will select up their heroes. Scythe will start selecting theirs.
translation.zh: EHOME将选择他们使用的英雄 Scythe也会开始选自己用的

translation.en: Looking now at both the teams, it looks like EHOME,
translation.zh: 现在看看两支队伍 EHOME看起来很放松

translation.en: they're fairly relaxed while Scythe, you know, they're eager.
translation.zh: EHOME看起来很放松 而我们都知道Scythe渴望胜利

translation.en: They're all gathering around hyhy to pick.
translation.zh: 他们都聚在hyhy周围 讨论该选哪个英雄

translation.en: [hyhy] If you have a losing draft, you will lose the game.
translation.zh: 如果你的阵容就很差的话 你会输掉比赛的

translation.en: This is what I think of Dota.
translation.zh: 这是我对《刀塔》的看法

translation.en: So it's really a lot on, on drafting.
translation.zh: 所以阵容的选择真的很重要

translation.en: [host] Drafting is where two captains will select what they want to play with.
translation.zh: 阵容的选择就是双方队长 在比赛开始前选择他们想使用的英雄

translation.en: What heroes are selected and what heroes are taken out.
translation.zh: 可以选择一些英雄 也可以禁止一些英雄被选

translation.en: You can select five heroes out of a pool of over a hundred,
translation.zh: 你可以从一百多个英雄中选择五个

translation.en: and can also remove four of those heroes.
translation.zh: 同时禁用掉四个

translation.en: So four heroes you think your opponent will want to use,
translation.zh: 所以如果你觉得哪四个英雄 你的对手可能会选择

translation.en: you can remove.
translation.zh: 你可以把他们禁掉

translation.en: [hyhy] Before any game, any match,
translation.zh: 在任何一场比赛开始前

translation.en: we will decide our bans and picks according to which team we are fighting.
translation.zh: 我们都会针对这次的对手 来选择要禁用和上场的英雄

translation.en: Usually, we would come up with a very impromptu strategy
translation.zh: 通常情况下我们的战术 大多是即兴想出来的

translation.en: to try and fight their strat.
translation.zh: 然后用以对抗对手的战术

translation.en: You really have to spend a lot of time thinking of the draft.
translation.zh: 阵容的选择非常需要时间进行思考

translation.en: The draft actually decides a lot of the game itself.
translation.zh: 选出来的阵容大多 就会确定比赛的基调

translation.en: [host] EHOME. They're a team with so much experience.
translation.zh: EHOME是一支经验十分丰富的队伍

translation.en: They already know the way they want to roll this one out.
translation.zh: 他们已经想好了这场比赛的策略了

translation.en: The only thing that's gonna make it or break it
translation.zh: 对他们来说唯一能够影响比赛结果的

translation.en: is if they can get their execution right.
translation.zh: 就是他们自身的执行力

translation.en: [hyhy] In that particular match-up, we felt that we needed something
translation.zh: 在这种对战匹配下 我们当时觉得应该选一个 打乱他们阵脚的英雄

translation.en: that could instill the fear in them.
translation.zh: 我们当时觉得应该选一个 打乱他们阵脚的英雄

translation.en: [host] And Tiny looks to be the last pick up here from Scythe.
translation.zh: Scythe这边的最后一个选择是小小

translation.en: A bit of an interesting pick up there by Scythe.
translation.zh: Scythe的这个选择挺有趣的

translation.en: It's gonna start to change around their lanes completely now.
translation.zh: 这样他们的英雄分路就完全变了

translation.en: [host] With Tiny, it is good as a surprise strat.
translation.zh: 选择小小是一个出乎对方意料的战术

translation.en: If another team doesn't realize where he fits into the whole lineup,
translation.zh: 如果对手搞不清楚这个英雄 在我们这套阵容里的定位

translation.en: then you can really throw the opposition off balance.
translation.zh: 那你就成功打乱了对手的阵脚了

translation.en: [host] He's moving away, but no, hyhy,
translation.zh: hyhy他要往回走了 不对

translation.en: he'll just turn around and pops the Lina.
translation.zh: 他要转身扔起莉娜

translation.en: I wanna point out right now that EHOME, they are not noobs.
translation.zh: 我现在想说明的是EHOME 并不是一帮菜鸟

translation.en: This is just Scythe playing an amazing game.
translation.zh: 只是Scythe发挥得太出色了

translation.en: [hyhy] When you have such a huge audience
translation.zh: 当有这么多观众看着你

translation.en: and you know that everyone is at home watching the game,
translation.zh: 你知道家里的每个人都在看比赛

translation.en: they have their hopes pinned on you and, and I feel that…
translation.zh: 他们把希望寄托在你身上 我感到这场比赛太关键了

translation.en: there's so much at, at stake.
translation.zh: 我感到这场比赛太关键了

translation.en: [host] And they should be able to clean it up right now.
translation.zh: 他们现在要收拾残局了

translation.en: Tiny, he's gonna toss, he's gonna launch, and he definitely gets the kill.
translation.zh: 小小 他要用投掷了 他起动了 他肯定会拿到这次击杀

translation.en: We got 357 getting nailed out there.
translation.zh: 357被定在那里了

translation.en: Nature's Prophet gonna get the last hit in as well.
translation.zh: 先知也会拿到最后一击

translation.en: It's the entire team down for EHOME. This is GG.
translation.zh: 整个EHOME都被打崩了 比赛结束了

translation.en: -This is now a double-rax, at least. -[screams]
translation.zh: -这至少要推掉两座兵营 -攻击啊

translation.en: And EHOME, they're going to disconnect.
translation.zh: 而EHOME他们断开了连接

translation.en: We have our first Winner's Bracket Finalist.
translation.zh: 我们第一支胜者组决赛队伍 已经出炉了

translation.en: Scythe will advance.
translation.zh: Scythe将会继续前进

translation.en: EHOME will drop down into the Loser's Bracket,
translation.zh: EHOME则将落入败者组

translation.en: and Scythe will now finish up this game.
translation.zh: Scythe现在正终结比赛

translation.en: Yeah, the one million is… Yeah, one million.
translation.zh: 好吧 那100万美元真是… 100万啊

translation.en: [chuckles] That's a lot.
translation.zh: 真是太多了

translation.en: It's gonna make my time playing this game all worth it.
translation.zh: 能够赢下的话那我在这游戏上 花的时间就完全值得了

translation.en: [hyhy] Didn't think smoking would do me any good.
translation.zh: 从没觉得抽烟对我有什么好处

translation.en: [man] When did you start smoking?
translation.zh: 你什么时候开始抽烟的？

translation.en: Two years back.
translation.zh: 两年前

translation.en: Two years back, uh…
translation.zh: 都抽两年了

translation.en: [clears throat] Bad move.
translation.zh: 不该抽的

translation.en: [man] That seems to coincide with when you and your ex-girlfriend broke up.
translation.zh: 好像时间上 和你前女友与你分手有点巧

translation.en: [hyhy] On bad terms.
translation.zh: 结局不是很好

translation.en: Seems like she's, she's moved on already.
translation.zh: 好像她已经放下了

translation.en: Back then when she was playing the game it felt like we had something
translation.zh: 当她还在玩这游戏的时候 感觉我们共同分享着这个游戏

translation.en: to… something we shared.
translation.zh: 感觉我们共同分享着这个游戏

translation.en: Yeah, but right now, it's like… tsk.
translation.zh: 不过现在 感觉

translation.en: I think she's… I think she's following this event, but… probably.
translation.zh: 我想她还是在看这届比赛 不过…

translation.en: This event's big. Yeah.
translation.zh: 大概吧 毕竟是场大赛

translation.en: I hope I will get to make that phone call. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我希望我能够拨出那个电话

translation.en: Finally, I'll have something I'm proud of to tell her about.
translation.zh: 我终于能告诉她一件 让我自豪的事情了

translation.en: Finally.
translation.zh: 终于

translation.en: [James] When you played the Russians and the Ukrainians,
translation.zh: 很好 别给他们进攻时间 阻止他们 可恶 都没打到 当你和俄罗斯以及乌克兰选手比赛时

translation.en: they were just the unpredictable teams.
translation.zh: 你会发现他们捉摸不透

translation.en: I had no idea what the Russians were thinking.
translation.zh: 我完全不知道俄罗斯选手们的想法

translation.en: That was their best weapon.
translation.zh: 而这恰好是他们最强大的地方

translation.en: [Dendi] Well, we're having fun. We're trying to relax.
translation.zh: 我们玩得很开心 也在努力地放松

translation.en: We're trying to scare our opponents.
translation.zh: 努力的让对手害怕我们

translation.en: Mind games. Mind games. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 拼心理的游戏 拼的就是心理

translation.en: [Dendi] I turn off my brain in the way of being scared of someone.
translation.zh: 我把我脑子里负责 害怕别人的功能关掉了

translation.en: One of the things I reallly admire about him is how…
translation.zh: 我最敬佩他的一点就是

translation.en: he hasn't really had an easy life,
translation.zh: 其实他过得并不好

translation.en: [Tammy] but he's always so upbeat. He's always so cheerful.
translation.zh: 但他总是如此乐观 他总是非常积极向上

translation.en: [host] When he first came on the Dota scene,
translation.zh: 当他刚进入刀塔圈的时候

translation.en: he looked like a 12-year-old boy.
translation.zh: 他看上去就像个12岁的熊孩子

translation.en: Everyone was just, like, "Who is this kid?"
translation.zh: 所有人的感觉都是 “这个小孩是谁？”

translation.en: There's no way you can take this guy seriously.
translation.zh: 你完全没办法严肃对待这家伙

translation.en: And then he would destroy you in games!
translation.zh: 然后他在游戏中就把你碾压了

translation.en: [in Russian] I saw somewhere on the Internet,
translation.zh: 我在网上看到过

translation.en: how he works with the keyboard.
translation.zh: 他在键盘上操作的手法

translation.en: [Irina, in Russian] It really is mesmerizing.
translation.zh: 我整个人都看呆了

translation.en: [Irina, in Russian] I think Danil benefited from his piano playing
translation.zh: 我觉得丹尼尔练钢琴 对他这个有一定好处

translation.en: because his hands are absolutely amazing.
translation.zh: 因为他的双手就像有魔力一般

translation.en: [Clement] He can make really good moves.
translation.zh: 他能做出十分精彩的操作 我觉得他的操作非常独特

translation.en: His moves, I think are unique, and they might win you the game.
translation.zh: 他能做出十分精彩的操作 我觉得他的操作非常独特 而且这是能带来胜利的操作

translation.en: But he wants to rely completely on skill.
translation.zh: 但是他想完全依靠技术取胜

translation.en: He wants, like, an enemy against him
translation.zh: 他想的是 比如面对一名对手

translation.en: and he wants to kill him through skill, nothing more.
translation.zh: 完全是依赖自己扎实的技术击杀对方

translation.en: He wants to win the game.
translation.zh: 他想赢得比赛

translation.en: His disadvantage is that he doesn't have patience.
translation.zh: 他的缺点就是缺乏耐心

translation.en: He wants to make those moves.
translation.zh: 他总想秀操作

translation.en: [host] He can get a little bit too silly in games.
translation.zh: 有时打比赛他会表现得有点蠢

translation.en: He will try new and different things.
translation.zh: 他乐意去尝试新的东西

translation.en: He will overextend in team fights because he believes he can get the kill.
translation.zh: 团战时他有时会穷追不舍 因为他坚信他能杀掉对方

translation.en: [Clement] And his impatience can go too far
translation.zh: 而这种缺乏耐心有时会比较过分

translation.en: and he might lose the game for us.
translation.zh: 这可能会让我们输掉比赛

translation.en: -[teammate] Team Na'Vi! -[all] Team Na'Vi!
translation.zh: （INVICTUS GAMING对战NA'VI） 专注目标！跨过障碍！

translation.en: [Toby] There it is, he's gonna go in. This should be the First Blood.
translation.zh: 先知 他要参战了 首杀应该要诞生了

translation.en: They got the Sprout on Sansheng as well. There's probably gonna be a double.
translation.zh: 他们还用发芽困住了Sansheng 有可能是双杀

translation.en: Dendi's ulti, it hits!
translation.zh: Dendi的终极技能命中了

translation.en: Dendi, Dendi, no. He's not… he cannot be.
translation.zh: Dendi 不 他不是在…他不可能吧

translation.en: This is Dendi through and through.
translation.zh: 那真是十足的Dendi招牌式操作

translation.en: Starts with the Hex, goes to Cold Snap, he locks him in place!
translation.zh: 先手妖术 跟上急速冷却 敌人被定在了原地

translation.en: Weaver really close to death! Manages to Timelapse back out again.
translation.zh: 编织者差点就死了 他用时光倒流恢复了原来的状态

translation.en: Dendi will TP back to safety.
translation.zh: Dendi要用回城卷轴 传送回安全的地方了

translation.en: So GG being called by iG. Na'Vi, they will take the game.
translation.zh: iG打出了GG Na'Vi 他们拿下了比赛

translation.en: Our Winners Bracket Finalists are gonna be Na'Vi versus Scythe.
translation.zh: 我们的胜者组决赛的两支队伍将是 Na'Vi和Scythe

translation.en: [Fear] Most teams that you see that have the most fan bases are full nationality.
translation.zh: 大多数粉丝数量众多的队伍里 成员的国籍都是相同的

translation.en: Our team is all spread out across the world.
translation.zh: 而我们的队员是来自世界各地

translation.en: [Tammy] He does have it a little harder than us
translation.zh: 在这一点上他碰到的困难比我们多

translation.en: because he doesn't really have this human support that we do.
translation.zh: 因为粉丝支持的确 没有达到这样的程度 比起我们差远了

translation.en: [Fear] The hardest thing that I've had to really deal with in my life
translation.zh: 我这辈子所做的事情中最艰难的就是

translation.en: is just trying to convince my family about my gaming career.
translation.zh: 努力去说服我的家人同意 我在电竞这条路继续走下去

translation.en: It's really, really difficult especially when you start out slow,
translation.zh: 真的 真的非常困难 特别是自己起步就非常晚

translation.en: but you know there's a future for something
translation.zh: 但是你也知道这条路是有未来的

translation.en: and you put a lot of time into it,
translation.zh: 你投入了很多时间

translation.en: and they keep telling you, "You should get a real job."
translation.zh: 而家人一直在说 你应该找一份像样的工作

translation.en: [Fear] I was born in the Los Angeles district in Lancaster, California.
translation.zh: 我出生在加州洛杉矶的兰开斯特区

translation.en: I lived there with my dad and my mom. Around two years old, my dad left my mom.
translation.zh: 我和我爸妈一起住 两岁多的时候爸爸就抛下了妈妈

translation.en: He didn't really say anything. He just kind of…
translation.zh: 他什么话都没留下 就是

translation.en: He just packed up and left.
translation.zh: 带上了他的东西离开了我们

translation.en: [Fear] She's had to raise us both while going to law school at the same time.
translation.zh: 她只能独自抚养我们哥俩 还要天天去法学院上课

translation.en: It wasn't real easy as far as just got out of law school,
translation.zh: 当时很困难 刚毕业 没有工作

translation.en: didn't have a job, had huge student loans to pay back.
translation.zh: 刚毕业 没有工作 欠着巨额学生贷款

translation.en: [Karen] This job came up and so we moved here on our own.
translation.zh: 找到这份工作后我们就搬到了这里

translation.en: So I've been raising them by myself ever since.
translation.zh: 从那开始我就一人抚养他们长大

translation.en: So this is a photo album that I made for Clinton.
translation.zh: 这是我给克林顿收集的相册

translation.en: For-- as he was growing up, I put pictures in it as we went along.
translation.zh: 我会经常把他成长过程中 拍的照片放进来

translation.en: My sons were both really active into sports
translation.zh: 两个儿子都对体育运动非常热衷

translation.en: and they wanted to do a lot so I had to limit them.
translation.zh: 而且他们想玩的运动非常多 所以我只能限制他们

translation.en: They could choose two per season.
translation.zh: 每个季节只能选报两项运动

translation.en: [Karen] That was maximum for me being able to get them to practice
translation.zh: 只报两项我才能抽出时间

translation.en: and go watch their games. That was tough.
translation.zh: 去学校看他们的比赛 的确是非常辛苦

translation.en: And Clinton sitting on Santa's lap, his brother, "Santa."
translation.zh: 这是克林顿 坐在他哥哥扮的圣诞老人腿上

translation.en: [Fear] My brother's more angry at my father for leaving than I am.
translation.zh: 对于父亲的出走 哥哥比我更加生气

translation.en: He thinks about him, he gets upset.
translation.zh: 他还念念不忘 弄得自己非常难过

translation.en: Compared to me, I just… I just block him out and pretend he doesn't exist.
translation.zh: 我就不一样了 我心里早就没有他了 当他从没存在过

translation.en: [Karen] Ah, Clinton already starting, uh, video games here.
translation.zh: 克林顿已经开始玩游戏了

translation.en: [Tony] He was sitting at his house, playing Dota.
translation.zh: 他在他的房子里坐着 玩《刀塔》

translation.en: Doing it competitively. Had a sponsored team and everything like that.
translation.zh: 打打比赛 组个有赞助商的 队伍之类的事情

translation.en: Uh, but I think that's when it probably started getting on his… his mom's nerves.
translation.zh: 但我想也就是那时 他的母亲开始感到不安

translation.en: [Fear] I have a crazy sleeping schedule.
translation.zh: 我的睡眠非常不规律

translation.en: I'm on a European team, so sometimes I have to stay up pretty ridiculous hours
translation.zh: 因为我是在一个欧洲战队里 所以有时我得熬夜到很晚

translation.en: or wake up at ridiculous hours.
translation.zh: 或者很早就得起来

translation.en: So the standard day for me is not so standard.
translation.zh: 这样我一天过下来很不正常

translation.en: All the nights he'd be up and stuff, the dog would be up too with him
translation.zh: 他整晚都不睡觉 害得狗狗也要陪着他

translation.en: and that would keep her awake most of the nights
translation.zh: 这样一来她晚上也经常睡不着

translation.en: and this is kind of where the tension got pretty high.
translation.zh: 所以他俩的关系变得很紧张

translation.en: [Karen] You know, this, this went on for years
translation.zh: 你知道吗？这种情况持续了好几年

translation.en: and it came to the point where I just told him
translation.zh: 到最后我就告诉他

translation.en: I said, "You know what, you just need to go somewhere else."
translation.zh: 听我说 你得搬到其他地方去住

translation.en: [Fear] So I got kicked out of my house because of my gaming career, basically.
translation.zh: 就这样 因为我的电竞生涯 我从家里被赶了出来

translation.en: [Pete] When Clinton first moved in here,
translation.zh: 克林顿刚搬进来的时候

translation.en: he was looking for a desk and there wasn't anything in the room.
translation.zh: 他想要一张桌子 但是房间里空空荡荡

translation.en: And I had a lot of stuff that we were getting ready to take to the dump.
translation.zh: 当时我正好有很多东西准备扔掉

translation.en: [Pete] And Clinton went out there and he came back in with this green desk.
translation.zh: 所以克林顿去抬了这张绿桌子回来

translation.en: And he goes, "This is perfect!"
translation.zh: 然后他说：“这下就完美了”

translation.en: So I didn't have a monitor, so I went to my friend
translation.zh: 那时我还没有显示器 于是我去找我的朋友

translation.en: and he had a spare CRT monitor.
translation.zh: 他有一台不用的CRT显示器

translation.en: So I got that, and then, obviously, I have two books here to hunch that up
translation.zh: 我就把它拿回来了 然后我又用了两本书把它垫高

translation.en: so I can actually see the monitor, so it's kind of a ghetto setup.
translation.zh: 这样我才能看得舒服点 一切都很简陋

translation.en: Even when I go to competitions, I don't think I play like any differently
translation.zh: 不过即便是跟在比赛现场 用的高端设备相比

translation.en: on the nice setups compared to this one.
translation.zh: 不过即便是跟在比赛现场 用的高端设备相比 这里的打起来也差不多

translation.en: Clinton's like, uh, the Rocky Balboa of Dota.
translation.zh: 克林顿就像是刀塔界的洛奇巴布亚

translation.en: He's the… he's definitely one of the first big US players.
translation.zh: 他毫无疑问是美国最老牌的选手之一

translation.en: [Tony] And, honestly, I didn't even, even know he was that big.
translation.zh: 说实话 我都不知道 他已经打了这么多年

translation.en: [Theeban] In the North American scene, there weren't many good American players known back then.
translation.zh: 在北美的刀塔圈里 当时优秀的本土选手非常少

translation.en: Everybody respected Fear.
translation.zh: 所有人对Fear都很尊敬

translation.en: [Fear] A lot of the people I knew, they quit the game.
translation.zh: 我认识的许多人都离开了 《刀塔》这款游戏

translation.en: They moved on, stuff like that.
translation.zh: 他们都去做其他的事情了

translation.en: But I stuck with it so I ended up being like one of the oldest players.
translation.zh: 但是我就认定《刀塔》了 于是乎我就成了最老牌的选手

translation.en: [Troels] With all his years of experience
translation.zh: 他这么多年来的游戏经历

translation.en: and all his constant commitment to the game,
translation.zh: 还有他对游戏不变的承诺

translation.en: he's really shown that he doesn't give up.
translation.zh: 这都表明他不会放弃自己的职业生涯

translation.en: [Fear] Growing up without my father, I think in the end, like…
translation.zh: 因为从小就没有爸爸 所以我想这么多年来形成现在的性格

translation.en: not having someone there to teach me of the guy side
translation.zh: 主要是因为没人教我怎么做男子汉

translation.en: and having a father to help you up, I think that it's actually probably made me, like, the person I am today.
translation.zh: 也没父亲来帮你 这一切让我成为了今天的自己

translation.en: You know, I just make sure everything's running smoothly on the team.
translation.zh: 我只想确保队伍的所有事情 都能顺顺利利

translation.en: I kind of play, like, the father figure, I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜我扮演的有点像父亲这样的角色

translation.en: [Jimmy] As a captain, I guess he felt he had that responsibility as well.
translation.zh: 我想他身为队长也会觉得 自己有这样的责任

translation.en: He was like pretty much my mentor.
translation.zh: 他很像是我的导师

translation.en: He did tell me one time,
translation.zh: 他有次还特地跟我说

translation.en: "Hey, if you need someone to talk to," you know, he would be here.
translation.zh: “如果你需要倾诉的对象 找我就行了”

translation.en: So I kind of see him as a Dota brother.
translation.zh: 所以我把他当成是刀塔大哥

translation.en: I've never had an ego, like, thinking that I'm better than anyone else.
translation.zh: 我从来没觉得自己比其他人都厉害

translation.en: I'm always there willing to help people who are new to the scene.
translation.zh: 所以我非常乐意去帮助 刚进入刀塔圈的人

translation.en: [Fear] And that's always been kind of my role in the game,
translation.zh: 天天帮助选手适应职业圈

translation.en: by just helping players get up, for the most part.
translation.zh: 差不多已经是我的家常便饭了

translation.en: [Theeban] Fear actually broke me into the scene, you know.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？ 事实上是Fear把我带进职业圈的

translation.en: It's very hard to get yourself out there.
translation.zh: 要突破自己成为职业选手很难

translation.en: I mean, back then, I was kind of like a fanboy of him.
translation.zh: 以前 我算是他的一个粉丝

translation.en: You know, watching his games and whatnot.
translation.zh: 就像总是看他的比赛之类的

translation.en: [Theeban] And he gave me a shot to play at a high level.
translation.zh: 然后他给了我一个 参与高端竞技的机会

translation.en: I wouldn't be here today if it wasn't for Fear.
translation.zh: 如果没有Fear我今天不可能站在这里

translation.en: I can guarantee you that.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问

translation.en: [Theeban] Going into the match, we were all thinking,
translation.zh: 比赛开始之前 我们都在想

translation.en: MUFC didn't do so well earlier, but…
translation.zh: MUFC之前战绩并不好 不过…

translation.en: If we lost that game, we wouldn't win anything, so…
translation.zh: 如果我们输掉了这个比赛 我们就拿不到奖金了

translation.en: it was a high-risk game.
translation.zh: 所以这场比赛的风险很大

translation.en: [Toby] Thirty-six minutes in, almost a 7,000 gold advantage in favor of MUFC.
translation.zh: 比赛进行到36分钟 MUFC经济领先了近七千

translation.en: [Fear] Toward the end, we made a couple of mistakes
translation.zh: 在比赛接近尾声时 我们犯了一些错误

translation.en: that put two heroes on the sideline for us.
translation.zh: 导致我们的两名英雄被击杀

translation.en: And they had all five still up and decided that they were gonna go for our Throne.
translation.zh: 而他们五人都依然存活 并且决定直接推掉我们的遗迹

translation.en: -They're probably gonna push for the base. -They're going GG!
translation.zh: 他们可能会直接攻击基地 他们要拿下比赛

translation.en: -They want to go for the GG! -No Fortification!
translation.zh: 他们想让对方打出GG 没有防御符文了

translation.en: [Theeban] We were really close to losing our Throne.
translation.zh: 当时我们的遗迹差一点就被摧毁了

translation.en: It's below 20 percent HP.
translation.zh: 它的生命值已经不到20%了

translation.en: [Toby] And Online Kingdom, they are so close to the point of getting eliminated from this tournament!
translation.zh: Online Kingdom 离被淘汰只有一步之遥了

translation.en: We just needed to do something.
translation.zh: 我们当时必须做点什么

translation.en: I'm going to go on them! I'm going to initiate on them!
translation.zh: 好 我要上了 我先手

translation.en: [Fear] I ran in first and then they all went on me
translation.zh: 我当时第一个冲了出去 吸引了所有人的火力

translation.en: instead of focusing on the Throne, which is good.
translation.zh: 他们没有集火攻击王座了 很好

translation.en: [Toby] Again by Silvercross.
translation.zh: 又是Silvercross

translation.en: Fear, he's trying to retreat. He turned into a pig.
translation.zh: Fear 他正在撤退 他被变形了

translation.en: How the hell is he still alive?
translation.zh: 他怎么活下来的？

translation.en: Go, go, go! Go, go!
translation.zh: 上 冲

translation.en: [Toby] They push MUFC back!
translation.zh: 他们把MUFC推了回去

translation.en: We made this huge comeback where we killed all of their heroes.
translation.zh: 我们杀死了他们的所有英雄 实现了大翻盘

translation.en: [Theeban] You know, started pushing.
translation.zh: 开始我们的推进

translation.en: [Toby] Silvercross is down! Morphling! He's out of this!
translation.zh: Silvercross被击杀 变体精灵 比赛和他无关了

translation.en: The Top Rax will go!
translation.zh: 上路兵营保不住了

translation.en: There is no way now that MUFC can come back!
translation.zh: MUFC不可能翻盘了

translation.en: It will be Online Kingdom eliminating MUFC! What an incredible…
translation.zh: Online Kingdom将淘汰MUFC

translation.en: Our whole team just went crazy.
translation.zh: 我们整个队伍都疯了

translation.en: [Toby] Fear leading Online Kingdom to do the impossible.
translation.zh: Fear带领Online Kingdom 完成了不可能完成的翻盘

translation.en: I've never seen anything like that.
translation.zh: 我从来没看过这样的比赛

translation.en: And stay tuned. We'll be back here for more exciting gameplay coming up.
translation.zh: 请不要离开 我们接下来还有更多精彩的比赛

translation.en: [Dendi] Scythe. They are the 2008 ESWC winners.
translation.zh: Scythe 他们是2008年ESWC的冠军

translation.en: One of the best Asian teams but we aren't afraid of them.
translation.zh: 亚洲最顶尖的队伍之一 不过我们不怕他们

translation.en: We're gonna fight them.
translation.zh: 我们将会和他们正面对决

translation.en: I don't know about my teammates, but I don't feel scared at all.
translation.zh: 我不知道我队友们怎么想 但我个人完全不怕和他们交手

translation.en: I feel like I want to crush my enemy.
translation.zh: 我想要碾压我的对手

translation.en: That's how I feel. That's it.
translation.zh: 这就是我的感受 就是这样

translation.en: [Toby] Welcome to the Winners Bracket Final
translation.zh: 欢迎来到胜者组决赛

translation.en: where Scythe goes up against Na'Vi.
translation.zh: 比赛将由Scythe对阵Na'Vi

translation.en: The winner gets a slot in the Grand Final.
translation.zh: 赢得胜利的一方将能获得总决赛席位

translation.en: [hyhy] The crowds were all cheering for them.
translation.zh: 围观群众都在为他们加油

translation.en: And their draft was very scary. We were, like, caught off by surprise.
translation.zh: 他们的阵容选择也很让人畏惧 我和我的小伙伴们都惊呆了

translation.en: But, we were like, "We've gotta win this, man."
translation.zh: 但是我们当时仍然觉得 我们必须赢下比赛

translation.en: We've gotta show them who's boss.
translation.zh: 我们必须获胜 告诉他们谁才是老大

translation.en: [Toby] Scythe has managed to take all the best players from Singapore and put them in their lineup.
translation.zh: Scythe汇集了新加坡所有顶尖选手 组成了一支队伍

translation.en: One million!
[Toby] Na'Vi, they look cool, calm, and collected.
translation.zh: Na'Vi看上去很从容镇定

translation.en: They know exactly what they gotta do.
translation.zh: 他们很清楚该做什么

translation.en: It all comes down to gameplay right now.
translation.zh: 现在归根结底拼的就是实力

translation.en: And I gotta say like, Na'Vi's lineup, it is not unbeatable.
translation.zh: 不得不说 Na'Vi的阵容并非不可战胜

translation.en: So now they're gonna look for the initiation and possible kill.
translation.zh: （NA'VI在比赛初期 对SCYTHE侵略性十足） 现在他们要找机会先手并击杀对方了

translation.en: hy is gonna get caught.
translation.zh: hyhy要被抓到了

translation.en: Now bottom lane. Held in place.
translation.zh: 现在看下路 被定住了

translation.en: Sven stunned. Sven will go down.
translation.zh: 斯温被晕住了 他要被击杀了

translation.en: LighTofHeaveN, he helped out, but Ancient Apparition gets the last hit.
translation.zh: LighTofHeaveN助攻 然后Dendi获得了本次击杀

translation.en: [Toby] Na'Vi are dominating this final.
translation.zh: Na'Vi主宰了这场比赛

translation.en: Now Na'Vi, they're gonna take the chance here.
translation.zh: 现在Na'Vi要抓住他们的机会了

translation.en: They're gonna go in for the GG.
translation.zh: 他们要一击制敌

translation.en: And GG is the call from hy first.
translation.zh: hyhy第一个打出了GG

translation.en: Na'Vi are already off their computers.
translation.zh: Na'Vi的队员们已经离开了电脑

translation.en: They're not even sticking around. They've got the GG.
translation.zh: 他们都不在周围晃悠 他们逼出了GG

translation.en: Na'Vi are into the Grand Finals and will play for the one million dollars.
translation.zh: Na'Vi进入了总决赛 接下来将为100万美元而拼

translation.en: Scythe will go down.
translation.zh: Scythe将落入败者组 迎战败者组决赛的胜利队伍

translation.en: They will face the winner of the Loser's Bracket.
translation.zh: Scythe将落入败者组 迎战败者组决赛的胜利队伍 （Scythe再败就将淘汰）

translation.en: [hyhy] We had just lost our confidence match against Na'Vi.
translation.zh: 我们刚输给Na'Vi 一场本来很自信能赢的比赛

translation.en: It was actually quite a blow to us.
translation.zh: 对我们来说打击很大

translation.en: The game was really the turning point for me
translation.zh: 对我来说那场比赛是一个转折点

translation.en: because I actually learned that in life you can only trust in yourself, actually…
translation.zh: 因为我深刻的体会到了 生活中你只能相信自己 真的

translation.en: not in the sense that you can't trust people,
translation.zh: 不是说不能相信别人

translation.en: but, yeah, like I said, the one who will never let you down is yourself.
translation.zh: 但是就像我说的 只有自己绝不会让自己失望

translation.en: [Fear] Within the gaming world, I'd like to be, be the first place.
translation.zh: 在电竞这个行业里 我要做最顶尖的那批人

translation.en: You know, it's like I'm following behind my mother's footsteps, basically.
translation.zh: 你也懂的 其实我基本是 追随了我母亲的脚步

translation.en: She worked really hard to get where she is,
translation.zh: 她工作非常辛苦 才有了今天的成就

translation.en: and I kind of wanna be the same way. I wanna work hard for whatever I do.
translation.zh: 我差不多也是这样 我不管做什么都想努力去做

translation.en: [Fear] For me, I mean, I've never really had a dad.
translation.zh: 对我来说 我从来没真正有过一个父亲

translation.en: So if I had any questions about anything,
translation.zh: 所以如果我对任何事情有疑问

translation.en: the person I was most comfortable talking to was my mom.
translation.zh: 我总是会愿意和我母亲说说

translation.en: [Fear] She definitely had the most influence on my life.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 她是我生命中 对我影响最大的人

translation.en: When she comes home from work,
translation.zh: 当她下班回家时

translation.en: she's always, you know, anxious to bring up the subject how she won a big case.
translation.zh: 她总是迫不及待地提起自己 如何赢得一个大案子

translation.en: I'm always proud of her when she wins these big cases
translation.zh: 每次我都非常以她为荣

translation.en: 'cause I know it means a lot to her.
translation.zh: 因为我知道这对她来说意义重大

translation.en: [Fear] In the back of my head, I'm always, like,
translation.zh: 在我内心深处 我总是觉得

translation.en: if I do well and if I win this tournament, you know,
translation.zh: 如果我发挥出色并且赢得本次比赛

translation.en: I'll finally be able to prove, like, I'm getting something out of this.
translation.zh: 我也终于能证明 自己从事这个行业并不是一事无成

translation.en: [Toby] And whoever wins this match will be facing up against EHOME,
translation.zh: 赢得这场比赛的队伍将面对EHOME

translation.en: but whoever will lose it, is going to be eliminated already.
translation.zh: 而输了的队伍将会被淘汰

translation.en: Like, EHOME, they're looking really strong right now.
translation.zh: EHOME现在看上去非常强

translation.en: [Fear] We had the stronger late-game heroes, the better team fight.
translation.zh: 我们有更强力的后期英雄 更容易取胜的团战

translation.en: Just all we had to do was just control the pushes.
translation.zh: 我们所要做的就是抵挡住他们的推进

translation.en: [Toby] Now, Online Kingdom, they're split! The stun on Santa! The splash as well.
translation.zh: Online Kingdom 他们被拆散了 Santa被晕住了 还被踩了一脚

translation.en: They're gonna claim a Windrunner. Will they? Yes, they do!
translation.zh: 他们将击杀风行者 能杀掉吗？好的 杀掉了

translation.en: It's 2-0 for Online Kingdom. Moscow 5, not the start they wanted.
translation.zh: Online Kingdom击杀数已经2比0领先 而这并不是Moscow 5想要的开局

translation.en: But Online Kingdom having an amazing start…
translation.zh: 但是对Online Kingdom来说 这是一个梦幻开局

translation.en: We were so close to winning until some few mistakes that occurred in the late game.
translation.zh: 我们几乎都要赢下比赛了 结果后期出现了几个失误

translation.en: [Toby] They might go right now.
translation.zh: 他们可能要进攻了

translation.en: There's four heroes standing right next to each other. The timing is wrong!
translation.zh: 这里四个英雄挤成一团 时机不对 看上去…

translation.en: [Fear] There's communication problems because we're an international team.
translation.zh: 由于我们是一支国际战队 所以交流出现了问题

translation.en: So I think full-nationality teams have an advantage over most teams.
translation.zh: 所以我认为真正意义上的国家队 相比其他大多队伍都更有优势

translation.en: [Toby] Almost there! Big try! Fear's in trouble though.
translation.zh: 就快成功了 再加把劲 但是Fear情况不太妙

translation.en: He's shackled and Lacoste is in. He casts his ulti as well.
translation.zh: 他被束缚击捆住了 Lacoste前来参战 他使用了终极技能

translation.en: [Theeban] And it just fell apart from there.
translation.zh: 他使用了终极技能 战局从这里就急转直下

translation.en: They just slowly beat us down.
translation.zh: 他们慢慢地蚕食掉我们

translation.en: Eventually, they just broke our base and took every single one of our raxes.
translation.zh: 最终他们摧毁了我们的基地 拔光了每一座兵营

translation.en: [Toby] This is really hurting Online Kingdom.
translation.zh: 这对Online Kingdom来说太伤了

translation.en: They've lost three. Enigma pops.
translation.zh: 他们已经阵亡了三名英雄 谜团阵亡了

translation.en: The team is wiped for Online Kingdom.
translation.zh: 整个队伍就被团灭了

translation.en: The base will be taken and Moscow 5 will now play EHOME and advance in the tournament.
translation.zh: 基地被摧毁了 M5将会继续前进 迎战EHOME

translation.en: Now, Online Kingdom, they are out. So much promise.
translation.zh: 现在Online Kingdom出局了 多有前景的队伍啊

translation.en: It didn't happen in the end for Fear and the rest of Online Kingdom,
translation.zh: Fear和他的队友们最终只能止步于此

translation.en: and it will be Moscow 5 that will advance…
translation.zh: Fear和他的队友们最终只能止步于此 继续前行的将是M5

translation.en: [Theeban] I think everybody on the team was very emotional.
translation.zh: 我想队伍中所有人情绪波动都很大

translation.en: I could only imagine how he was feeling.
translation.zh: 我没法想象他当时的感觉

translation.en: [Dominik] Some people take it more personally and they give everything to win.
translation.zh: 有的人比较放在心上 为了能赢付出了所有

translation.en: [Theeban] It was very satisfying knowing that we reached that Top 8,
translation.zh: 我们进入前八已经很满足了

translation.en: but he had better expectations for our team,
translation.zh: 但是他对我们队伍期望比较高

translation.en: and we'd come a long way and it's all thanks to Fear.
translation.zh: 我们能走到这么远都多亏了Fear

translation.en: [Dominik] If you don't go as far as you thought you were gonna be,
translation.zh: 如果并没有达到自己期望的目标

translation.en: I guess you end up in tears or something.
translation.zh: 我想落泪也正常的吧

translation.en: [Fear] All of us are really disappointed, but I guess that's just how it goes.
translation.zh: 我们都很失望 不过… 我觉得生活就是这样

translation.en: When I get back home, I need to make a big decision in my life.
translation.zh: 当我回家以后 我得做一个很重要的决定

translation.en: Like, just the benefits of playing Dota professionally,
translation.zh: 这也是成为职业刀塔选手的好处

translation.en: how much I can make from it,
translation.zh: 我能获得什么

translation.en: and how much time I really need to put into it to be 100 percent, so…
translation.zh: 我能获得什么 还有我需要花费多少时间 才能做到100%投入 所以…

translation.en: [Fear] The only way I would ever do that is if I move in with my teammates
translation.zh: 我能全情投入的唯一方式就是 和我的队友搬到一起住

translation.en: and have like a training house with them,
translation.zh: 共同拥有一个训练基地

translation.en: so I know for sure that we're all dedicated.
translation.zh: 我很肯定我们都非常投入和专注

translation.en: I think things happen for a reason,
translation.zh: 我认为任何事情都事出有因

translation.en: and when things happen, you just do your best
translation.zh: 当它们发生的时候 你只管做到最好

translation.en: and continue going forward with it.
translation.zh: 并且继续坚持下去

translation.en: I mean, deep down inside, I know this career is gonna work out for me in the end.
translation.zh: 在我内心深处 我知道电竞职业生涯 最后总是能让我得到回报的

translation.en: [analyst, in Chinese] As for the Chinese teams, I hope and know
translation.zh: 而我们中国战队呢 我也是非常的希望

translation.en: that they're capable of coming out of the Losers Bracket.
translation.zh: 也相信能从我们的败者组杀回来

translation.en: The top three teams are likely to be Na'Vi, Scythe, and a Chinese team
translation.zh: 目前来看的话 很可能前三强将会是由Na'Vi

translation.en: which I personally hope will be EHOME.
translation.zh: Scythe以及我们中国战队中的一支 我个人是希望是EHOME

translation.en: [woman analyst, in Chinese] Emotionally, I would hope
translation.zh: 感情上来说呢 肯定是EHOME

translation.en: that EHOME would win.
translation.zh: 我们自己中国的战队 又是一个老牌的战队

translation.en: Turning him into a pig! They need to get this kill.
translation.zh: 将他变形成一只猪 他们需要这次击杀

translation.en: The stun! The Weaver Wave! It's a little piglet!
translation.zh: 晕住了 编织者 他成了一只小猪

translation.en: And it's dead! Slardar! 820, he's almost dead!
translation.zh: 他死掉了 鱼人守卫 820 他残血了

translation.en: Burrow Strike! Epicenter!
translation.zh: 掘地穿刺 地震

translation.en: 357! It's a double-kill by the Weaver!
translation.zh: 357 编织者获得了双杀

translation.en: EHOME, they'll lose FCB as well.
translation.zh: 不过EHOME队的FCB也阵亡了

translation.en: Moscow 5, casualties of war.
translation.zh: M5 战争的牺牲品

translation.en: Holy Hell!
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: [Zou, in Chinese] In China, this game is a professional career.
translation.zh: 在中国 这个游戏 已经是相当的职业化

translation.en: We are stressed because we have to win.
translation.zh: 他们有一个成绩上的压力

translation.en: If we don't win or we lose to foreign teams,
translation.zh: 他们如果不拿… 中国战队如果不拿到成绩的话 或者输给国外队的话

translation.en: [Zou, in Chinese] Chinese fans will have doubt in us.
translation.zh: 国人会给他们质疑 也会造成很多压力

translation.en: [Toby] Now Lion though is gonna find him. Boxes him up.
translation.zh: 现在莱恩要找到他了 他被变形了

translation.en: Finger's already started. There's the stun.
translation.zh: 死亡一指已经施放

translation.en: Maelk in a lot of trouble. Really caught out of position.
translation.zh: 眩晕也接上了 Maelk麻烦大了 位置不好被抓了

translation.en: AA ulti will fly in but hits on nothing. Mania with the SK ultimate…
translation.zh: 远古冰魄的终极技能飞了过来 但是没有命中 Mania的沙王还有终极技能

translation.en: [Tang, in Chinese] The situation is China against the world.
translation.zh: 就是形成中国打世界的局面

translation.en: If we win the championship, it is what we are supposed to do.
translation.zh: 这本来就是我的本职工作 如果拿冠军的话是应该的

translation.en: I tell them, if you are coming here, you are here for the first place.
translation.zh: 我告诉他们 如果你来这里 就是来拿冠军的

translation.en: I will tell them every day, we must accomplish this. We must achieve this.
translation.zh: 我告诉他们 如果你来这里 就是来拿冠军的 我每天都会跟他们说 我们一定要做到这件事 我们必须要做到这件事

translation.en: [Toby] Now PLT. Support Teleporting in. FCB gets the first stun.
translation.zh: 国士无双和辅助 都传送过来了 FCB先手晕住

translation.en: Misery over-commits on the top lane.
translation.zh: Misery在上路赌输了

translation.en: -[shouts] -GG!
translation.zh: GG

translation.en: [Tang, in Chinese] I can feel they really want to beat us,
translation.zh: 他们真的 我能感觉到 他们真的很想赢我们国外的队伍

translation.en: the foreign teams.
translation.zh: 他们真的很想赢我们国外的队伍

translation.en: PLT, he's had enough of this. FCB! What a time for a Frog!
translation.zh: 国士无双 他受够了 FCB 这个变形术的时机

translation.en: Misery will pop!
translation.zh: Misery爆炸了
